remarks: Membership in the base set of the free module.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ frlmelbas as of 23-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
frlmval.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmelbasOLD.n $e |- N = ( Base ` R ) $.
frlmelbasOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
frlmelbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmelbasOLD $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> ( X e. B <-> ( X e. ( N ^m I ) /\ ( `' X " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) ) ) $.
